DataElement.preferredName: Polypectomy Specimen Characteristic Stalk Length Float mm
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The length of the stalk of the polyp, in millimeters

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Complete or partial removal of a polypoid lesion from the mucosal surface.:A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid ta:The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance._A slender or elongated structure that supports another usually larger structure.:The linear extent in space from one end of something to the other end, or the extent of something from beginning to end.

A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.
